translations: abbr.一般认为安全（Generally Recognized as Safe）
n.（Gras）人名；（英、法、德、西、意）格拉斯

sentences.sentence: Production of the foie gras pt involves force-feeding geese and ducks so that their livers swell.
sentences.translation: 肥鹅肝产品是用强行灌食后肿胀起的鸭肝和鹅肝制成的。

sentences.sentence: Mole groaned dolorously: "no butter, no—no pate de foie gras, no champagne!"
sentences.translation: 莫尔悲哀地呻吟着：“没有黄油，没有——没有鹅肝酱，没有香槟！”

sentences.sentence: Hit up Mardi Gras in New Orleans.
sentences.translation: 参加新奥尔良的狂欢节。
